name: The Shield
mission: Detect global risk pressure, cross-asset stress, volatility clusters, and fragility vectors.
ai_analysis: Despite a low overall risk score, the market exhibits a pocket of extreme fragility centered on a critical shock in the USD/JPY exchange rate. While broader volatility metrics in bonds (MOVE) and equities (VIX) remain contained, this severe currency dislocation presents a primary contagion risk. Watch for this stress to spill over, potentially triggering a rapid repricing in other asset classes.
